name: Blue Brinstar Energy Tank Room Bottom
Blue Brinstar Energy Tank Room Top
Etecoon Energy Tank Room Bottom Left
Pink Brinstar Power Bomb Room Bottom Right
Spiky Platforms Tunnel Left
note: Getting to the left is easier when starting from a new game or loading from the menu:
run left immediately, landing on the moving platform and continuing running left off of it;
do a short spin-jump to the left and then a second spin-jump to the left to land back on top of the moving platform;
crouch while riding the platform to avoid the last spike.
It can also be done from a quick reload (after death or with L + R + Select + Start) but this is more difficult because the moving platform is not in an ideal position:
use spin jumps with ledge grabs onto the floor to move quickly and minimize lava damage;
spin jump onto the moving platform after you are past the last spike.
devNote: This could be done in 320 heat frames, but we use a higher value since we don't want this coming into logic below Expert.
